entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lévis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
